text: The Leipzig Opera is an opera house and opera company in Leipzig. It was created in 1693. Georg Philipp Telemann was the opera house's director from 1703 to 1705. The opera house was closed when Johann Sebastian Bach worked in Leipzig. == References == ==Other websites== * (in English) *Interview with Damien Diaz, Principal Dancer under Uwe Scholz Category:17th-century establishments in Germany Category:Opera houses in Germany
title: Leipzig Opera
